amendment.description: To provide for the enforcement of protections on consumer credit for members of the Armed Forces and their dependents.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7332; text: CR S7332) To provide for the enforcement of protections on consumer credit for members of the Armed Forces and their dependents.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed.
